entities.name: basilisk
entities.description: The basilisk is described as a creature that has swept the Sorting Hat into Harry's arms and is attacking him. It is said to have a tail that swings over Harry again.

entities.name: sorting hat
entities.description: The sorting hat is described as being swept by the basilisk into Harry's arms. It is then used by Harry as his only chance for survival.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is being attacked by the basilisk. He uses the sorting hat to protect himself and eventually kills the basilisk with a sword that appears inside the hat.

relationships.description: The basilisk sweeps the sorting hat into Harry's arms.
Harry uses the sorting hat to protect himself from the basilisk.
A sword appears inside the sorting hat.
Harry uses the sword to kill the basilisk.
